title: Pump Cup Leathers for 2 Pint Stoves
desc: Outer diameter is 17-18 mm. These pump cups fit most of 2 pint stoves, lanterns and blowtorches such as Optimus 1S, Optimus 5, Optimus 45, Primus 5, Svea 5, Svea 106, Radius 17, Optimus 200, Optimus 300, Optimus 930, Primus 1020, Primus981, Primus 991, Primus 1321, Primus 632, Radius 119, Radius 103, Bialaddin 305, Bialaddin 310, Bialaddin 315, Bialaddin Bowlfire, Vapalux 320, M320, Petromax 250, Petromax 350, Petromax 500, Hasag, Sievert, Maxim, Barthel 501, Barthel 100, Barthel 296 etc.

title: Pump Cup Leathers for 1 Pint Stoves
desc: Outer diameter is 13-14 mm.These pump cups fit most of 1 pint stoves such as Optimus 111 hiker, Primus 96, Burmos 21, Primus 22, Primus 210, Radius 21 etc.

title: Pump Cup Leathers for Coleman Stoves & Lanterns
desc: Pump cup leathers for Coleman lanterns and stoves. Photos are showing some Coleman items where these pump leathers perfectly fit. Get rid of the neoprene washers! Upgrade to leather!
imgPath: /images/Pump Cup Leathers for Coleman Stoves & Lanterns

title: Pump Cup Leathers for Tilley Lamps
desc: Pump cup leathers for Tilley lanterns. Outer diameter is ~16 mm.

title: Repair Kit for Enders Stoves
desc: Repair kit for German Enders pressure stoves. Pump leathers have been newly produced identical to genuine design.This kit perfectly fits Enders 9060, 9060D, 9061, 9061D, 9065D, 9063 (baby)models.
Price covers 3 items together ie 1 pump leather, 1 large viton oring and 1 small viton oring.

title: Pump cup leathers for Optimus Nova Trangia Primus Ergo Pump
desc: Excellent pump cup leathers for Optimus Nova, Nova +, Trangia stoves and Primus ErgoPumps.
imgPath: /images/Pump cup leathers for Optimus Nova Trangia Primus Ergo Pump
